Liuyang county level city in Changsha 長沙|长沙[Chang2 sha1], Hunan

sentences.english: The history of Liuyang fireworks dates back to the year 1740.
sentences.chinese: 瀏陽花炮創制於1740年，生產歷史悠久。

sentences.english: There is only one practicing spot here in Liuyang. I have been there for only three times.
sentences.chinese: 在瀏陽只有一個高爾夫場地，我去過三次。

sentences.english: The metallurgical pertormance was bad in LiuYang refractory Lead -Zinc Mine.
sentences.chinese: 瀏陽含銀難選鉛鋅礦多年來選礦生產指標不好。

sentences.english: The vault and invert of Liuyanghe tunnel lining are the dangerous position for the lining.
sentences.chinese: 瀏陽河隧道二襯最不利位置一般位於仰拱或拱頂處。

sentences.english: Xie Jianhui also participated in the discussion of Liu Yang City delegation.
sentences.chinese: 謝建輝等同志分別到瀏陽市等代表團參加討論。

sentences.english: This dialectical relationship is lively shown in the Liuyang case.
sentences.chinese: 瀏陽個案生動地說明了這一辯證關係。

sentences.english: Consider a recent incident in Liuyang City, in central China's Hunan Province.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們看看最近在中國湖南省瀏陽市發生的一起事件。

sentences.english: There is no doubt that Liuyang Fireworks encounter a golden opportunity for development.
sentences.chinese: 毫無疑問，瀏陽花炮遇到了一個千載難逢的發展機遇。
